resources.string: HIGH QUALITY MALARIA DIAGNOSIS IN LOW RESOURCE ENVIRONMENTS
Welcome, we will guide you through the setup in order to start with the analysis
Clean both camera lens and microscope lens to remove any dirt that can interfere with the detection
Place the phone into the holding kit provided and secure the holding kit to the microscope
Check if the phone is properly attached to the microscope and make sure the battery is charged
Prepare the blood smear, ensure the blood smear is thick enough and check for contamination
We will need to take a picture of the sample blood to calibrate the camera
After placing blood smear underneath the microscope lens wait until MOMALA App gives confirmation that the image is focused
Move the blood smear when asked, STOP moving when prompted. While changing position of the blood smear do not make any sudden movements
During focusing do not touch the microscope or mobile phone to yield high quality images
After focusing, the application takes images automatically and shows the progress to you
Wait until the results are shown and upload them to your server for safekeeping
Well done, once you click on the start button the app will start taking pictures automatically
No more pictures are needed. Results will be shown in a second.
This app demonstrates the usage of CameraView. In order to do that, it needs permission to access camera.
Camera app cannot do anything without camera permission.
This picture has been already taken.
Click on START if you want to analyse another blood sample.
There is no strong evidence that the patient has malaria
Patient may have symptoms below this level, where malaria is seasonal
Level above which immunes show symptoms
Maximum parasitemia of P.v. and P.o.
You have successfully finished the analysis. Here there are the results:
